title: At This Museum, Falling Back An Hour Takes The Whole Weekend
teaser: When Daylight Saving Time arrives, who adjusts all those old clocks? Noel Poirier, director of the National Watch and Clock Museum, tells NPR's Scott Simon he has to turn back 60 pendulum clocks.
contentencoded: Copyright 2014 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
